block.p: Because of editing errors, a front-page article on Friday about West Point's teaching of the history of the Vietnam War omitted the given name of the former American commander in some copies and misstated his middle initial. He was Gen. William C. Westmoreland.
The article also misstated the surname of an Army colonel who formerly taught history at West Point and who wrote ''Dereliction of Duty,'' a book about Vietnam. He is H. R. McMaster, not McMillan.

Because of editing errors, a front-page article on Friday about West Point's teaching of the history of the Vietnam War omitted the given name of the former American commander in some copies and misstated his middle initial. He was Gen. William C. Westmoreland.
The article also misstated the surname of an Army colonel who formerly taught history at West Point and who wrote ''Dereliction of Duty,'' a book about Vietnam. He is H. R. McMaster, not McMillan.
